author: CBC News
title: Targeting super yachts owned by Russian oligarchs could hit a nerve in Moscow | CBC Radio
description: With sanctions levied and financial assets seized in response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, industry watchers say Russian oligarchs are trying to keep their yachts from being taken.
content:
With sanctions levied and financial assets seized, Russian oligarchs have been scrambling to get their super yachts out of Western ports in search of safer harbours.
